page0.content: <p align="center"> <img width="600" height="150" src="/lct-infos/images/panorama_donostia.jpg" alt="A photo of La Contxa, Donostia. By Nils Beck"> </p> . Welcome // Bienvenid@ // Ongi etorri . to the unofficial info page for students of the LCT master’s program at University of the Basque Country! Since students come and go every year, transferring knowledge about how to best get settled in Donostia-San Sebastián can be hard. This web site is one intent from previous students to make life easier for incoming students. .
